body:
so according to c10 prototype it actually represents just CPUTensor, right? And the dtype is incorporated inside (and btw, I agree that it's the right functionality)

In that case the comment is not very representative.

For dispatch purposes - how are you going to handle the separate dtype - construct custom key, right?
